panels.description: Number of requests which apiserver terminated in self-defense

panels.description: Response size distribution in bytes for each group, version, verb, resource, subresource, scope and component

panels.description: Number of requests released by API Priority and Fairness system for service

panels.description: Duration of request execution in the API Priority and Fairness system

panels.description: Number of requests currently pending in queues of the API Priority and Fairness system
panels.title: p&f - pending in queue

panels.description: Shared concurrency limit in the API Priority and Fairness system
panels.title: p&f - concurrency limit by kube-apiserver
